question: Which sportsman was recently named "BBC Sports Personality of the year 2019"?
explanation: Ben Stokes, the famous all rounder of the England Cricket team has won the coveted \" BBC Sports Personality of the year 2019\". He played a crucial role in the World Cup finals match against New Zealand. This is one among the BBC\'s annual sporting awards, that honours sportspersons and teams selected through public voting.  The England Cricket team won the Best Team of the year award.
